thread.title: Ground News - Defeat 'not an option' to Ukrainians trained by Windsor soldier
thread.title_full: Ground News - Defeat 'not an option' to Ukrainians trained by Windsor soldier

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Defeat 'not an option' to Ukrainians trained by Windsor soldier
text:
Summary by Ground News Cpl. Peter Dyck, a reservist with the Essex and Kent Scottish Regiment, was stationed in England from last June until December. He was working with fellow soldiers from Canada, Lithuania and the United Kingdom at an undisclosed location as part of a broader international effort to help Ukraine repel Russia. Over 100 Canadian Armed Forces members are currently deployed in the UK and Poland. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Windsor Star Lean Right High Factuality Individual: Leon Cooperman Corporation: Allianz Defeat 'not an option' to Ukrainians trained by Windsor soldier Defiantly facing down invaders from a military superpower boasting one of the world's largest armies, Ukraine's battle for survival must surely appear to many outsiders as Mission: Impossible.
46 minutes ago · Windsor, Canada Read Full Article
